description:
He wasn’t on our dream casting list, but he’ll definitely do! Kendrick Sampson (Greek) has been cast as Jesse in The Vampire Diaries Season 5, TV Guide reports.他和我们想象的不一样，不过他千真万确是《吸血鬼日记》第五季的新演员！《电视指南》杂志报道，Kendrick Sampson将会在《吸血鬼日记》第五季中扮演Jesse这个角色。

Described as smart, very attractive, and sweet, Jesse could be interested in Caroline (Candice Accola) when he makes his debut in the October 10 premiere. Sorry, Tyler (Michael Trevino)!Jesse这个角色聪明、有魅力、人很好，在《吸血鬼日记》10月10日首播集就会出现，并且吸引了Caroline。对不起了，Tyler！

Jesse hates vampires. Also, Jesse is an upperclassman at Whitmore College, so maybe he’ll show Caroline and Elena (Nina Dobrev) the ropes before throwing garlic at them and trying to ward them off with crosses. Jesse讨厌吸血鬼。而且Jesse是Whitemore大学的高年级学生。不过在对吸血鬼扔大蒜，拿十字架之前，他应该帮了Caroline和Elena不少忙。

title: 《吸血鬼日记》第五季：Caroline的新情人长这样
